title: Bug 134488: Set page break for table inside list group header causes data display error.
OB: Data in the table displays only the first data row in each page when page break is set for a table inside a list group header.
EB:
See attached report.
Expected result: Data should display correctly on all pages.
Actual result: In Web Viewer, data in the table is displaying only the first data row on each page. In HTML/PDF, it appears correctly.
SR:
Description:
Setting a page break for a table inside a list group header causes a data display error.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a list with a group.
2. Insert a table into the list group header.
3. Set 'pagebreakbefore' to 'always' for the table.
4. Preview in Web Viewer/HTML/PDF.
